sentences.en: Angela McCormick , the headteacher, refused to comment on the incident.
sentences.cn: “布莱克肖街”小学的安吉拉? 麦科密克 校长拒绝对此事发表评论.

sentences.en: I know a number of parents have rung the headteacher about what has happened but I would appeal for everyone to be calm, particularly in relation to those people involved.
sentences.cn: 我知道一些家长正围着校长问事情发生的经过，但我呼吁大家要保持冷静，特别是在那些跟这件事有直接关系的人。

sentences.en: Just as the teacher plays the role of leader in the classroom, so does the headteacher play a leadership role in the school.
sentences.cn: 在课堂上老师扮演着领导者的角色，同样，在学校里校长也充当着领导者的角色。
张小姐是我们的班主任.

sentences.en: Mr. Chen, our headteacher a cool and kind boy.
sentences.cn: 陈先生, 我们的班主任,冷静和善良的男孩.

sentences.en: Our headteacher divided our class into eight groups.
sentences.cn: 我们班主任把我们班划分成八个小组.

sentences.en: The children's unruly behaviour incurred the headteacher's wrath.
sentences.cn: 小学生不守规矩惹得校长发怒.

sentences.en: The headteacher of the school reserves a veto over management - board decisions.
sentences.cn: 学校校长保留对管理理事会决定的否决权.
